Class Appointment

java.lang.Object
com.group6.hms.app.managers.appointment.models.Appointment
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventInterface, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AppointmentView
public class Appointment extends Object implements Serializable, EventInterface
The Appointment class represents an appointment within the system, detailing information about the patient, doctor, status, date, and time of the appointment. It implements Serializable for storage purposes and EventInterface for integration with calendar event displays.
See Also:
